translations: adj.最终的，结局的；<古>有条件的

phrs.translation: 世事无常, 世事难料, 无限可能, 书名
最终结果, 最终的结果
最终处理, 最后处理

sentences.sentence: The village school may face eventual closure.
sentences.translation: 这所乡村学校可能最终会面临关闭。

sentences.sentence: It is impossible to predict what the eventual outcome will be.
There are many who believe that civil war will be the eventual outcome of the racial tension in the country.
sentences.translation: 有许多人认为内战将是该国种族关系紧张的最终结果。
